# Diagnostics module

> **来源**: <https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/unrealenginedotcom/temporary/diagnostics>
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-27T02:02:21.277399

---

Module import path: /UnrealEngine.com/Temporary/Diagnostics

- [`UnrealEngine.com`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/unrealenginedotcom)
- [`Temporary`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/unrealenginedotcom/temporary)
- **`Diagnostics`**

## Classes and Structs

| Name | Description |
| --- | --- |
| [`debug_draw_channel`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/unrealenginedotcom/temporary/diagnostics/debug_draw_channel) | debug\_draw\_channel is the base class used to define debug draw channels. |
| [`debug_draw`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/unrealenginedotcom/temporary/diagnostics/debug_draw) | debug draw class to draw debug shapes on screen. |
| [`log_channel`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/unrealenginedotcom/temporary/diagnostics/log_channel) | log\_channel is the base class used to define log channels. When printing a message to a log, the log channel class name will be prefixed to the output message. |
| [`log`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/unrealenginedotcom/temporary/diagnostics/log) | log class to send messages to the default log |

## Enumerations

| Name | Description |
| --- | --- |
| [`debug_draw_duration_policy`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/unrealenginedotcom/temporary/diagnostics/debug_draw_duration_policy) | Enumerated presets for policies describing a desired draw duration. |

|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| [`log_level`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/unrealenginedotcom/temporary/diagnostics/log_level) | log levels available for various log commands |
